title: Pick Me Or Your Mama
itunes:title: Pick Me Or Your Mama
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I am a young woman in my early 30s and I have been dating at 44 year old man for 10 years. We have had a great relationship until recently, when his mother moved to the city we live in. Since then, we’ve been fussing more and I’m really starting to dislike him. His true colors are showing, all because of his mother! We cannot move on with our lives because his mother is stuck on her son not being with her whenever he has extra time in his schedule...............

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I am a young woman in my early 30s and I have been dating at 44 year old man for 10 years. We have had a great relationship until recently, when his mother moved to the city we live in. Since then, we’ve been fussing more and I’m really starting to dislike him. His true colors are showing, all because of his mother! We cannot move on with our lives because his mother is stuck on her son not being with her whenever he has extra time in his schedule...............
